Events that occurred on 3 September.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 80.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 140b.
1971 - Mythcon 2 in Santa Barbara, California.
2004 - The Evening Chronicle publishes an excerpt of a letter from Tolkien to an unknown fan.
2006 - The Lord of the Rings (musical) closes at a loss in Toronto.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
